themes.description: April 2025 is identified as a critical month where multiple Gann time cycles (15, 30, 45, 60, 75, and 90 year cycles) converge simultaneously. Historical April events include the Oklahoma City bombing (1995), Iraq-Iran wars (1980), Vietnam War escalation (1965), and the Stresa Front (1935). This convergence suggests elevated probability of significant global events.

Current reports indicate extraordinary concentration of American military power in the Middle East (7 B-2A bombers, dozens of KC-135 tankers, C-17A transports, F-35 fighters plus carrier groups). The cyclical pattern suggests this is not coincidental and aligns with the historical pattern of escalation during these time windows.

Most assets show positive seasonal bias for April (S&P one of top 3 months, Oil best month, EUR/USD positive, Bitcoin 64% positive). However, the cyclical analysis warns of potential trend changes and deterioration. This creates a tension between seasonal expectations and deeper cyclical patterns.

EUR/USD broke above multi-year resistance at 1.0936, gold is at all-time highs, and the overall pattern suggests dollar weakness. This theme connects EUR/USD strength, gold's breakout, and potential S&P vulnerability.

Multiple assets show key technical levels converging with cycle dates: S&P at 5,120-5,140, Bitcoin at $89,500-$93,300, Gold at $3,050, Oil at $62.50-$65.50. These represent high-probability reaction zones when hit in conjunction with turning dates.

risk_rules: Never label turning dates as 'high' or 'low' in advance - the direction only becomes clear as price approaches the date.
Each turning date has a tolerance of +/- 1 trading day from the marked date.
When two dates appear close together (double cycle), the first typically creates a correction and the second restores the original trend.
A 'continuing cycle' date means the date does not reverse the trend but confirms continuation - this requires different positioning.
Maintain 30-40% of portfolio in liquid non-equity assets during periods of uncertainty.
Use stop-losses at significant support/resistance levels. Lock in partial profits at resistance zones.
The combination of turning date + technical level alignment + dominant trend direction produces the highest probability setups.
Avoid leveraged ETF positions during elevated uncertainty periods.
Stay connected to the Discord community for real-time updates as market conditions evolve throughout the month.
These reports are for educational purposes only and do not constitute investment advice.

previous_month_performance.sp500: 4 dates, 2 successful turning points (6.3 and 25.3), 1 continuing cycle (18-19.3), 1 partial (14.3 low but continuation). Net: successful identification of key extremes.
previous_month_performance.bitcoin: 4 dates, all arrived on time. 3.3 marked high, 7.3 marked high with 16% decline, 17-18.3 marked low with 8% rally, 26.3 marked high. Very effective month.
previous_month_performance.eurusd: 3 dates, 2 successful (13-14.3 low with 120 pip rally, 19-20.3 high with 210 pip decline), 1 non-classical but profitable (6-7.3). Strong performance.
previous_month_performance.gold: 4 dates, 3 successful turning points + 1 continuing cycle. 7.3 low (+4%), 14.3 continuation, 20.3 high, 27.3 low (+4%). Exceptionally strong.
previous_month_performance.oil: 3 dates, 1 clear success (6.3 low +4%), 2 continuing cycles (21.3 and 28.3). Decent but less precise than other assets.
